import { useState } from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductDetail() { const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const { id } = useParams(); console.log(id) useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/products/'+{id}) .then(res => res.json()) .then( res => console.logsetProduct(res.product)) },[]) return product &&
